thread.title: "We were not really thinking the same": Trump on Tillerson

title: "We were not really thinking the same": Trump on Tillerson
text:
"We were not really thinking the same": Trump on Tillerson 2:03pm GMT - 00:40 
After replacing Secretary of State Rex Tillerson with CIA Director Mike Pompeo, President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he and Tillerson had a different mindset on certain policies including the Iran nuclear deal. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
After replacing Secretary of State Rex Tillerson with CIA Director Mike Pompeo, President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he and Tillerson had a different mindset on certain policies including the Iran nuclear deal. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2p9jV28
